movie1: A author struggling from writer's block and his wife's upcoming divorce, he heads to his remote cabin in upstate New York for solitude until a farmer from Mississippi accuses him of plagiarizing his story. He learns how dangerously far the farmer will go in his journey for retribution.
movie2: A man afraid of commitment up until he meets a beautiful girl. They hit it off and he think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.
movie3: A boy with powers has to fight a mad scientist besides his troubles in personal life.
